row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) >= 3)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) >= 2)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) = 1)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(is_returning) >= 1)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 3)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 2)
row_desc: Queen has at least three mini challenge wins.
Queen has at least two mini challenge wins.
Queen has one mini challenge win.
col_desc: Queen returned to the competition during any season.
Queen has three lip sync wins.
Queen has two lip sync wins.
